FuncDef:
The service-instance-group command creates a value-added service management (VSM) high availability (HA) instance group or displays the VSM HA instance group view.
The undo service-instance-group command deletes a VSM HA instance group.
By default, no VSM HA instance group is configured.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of a VSM HA instance group.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported. When double quotation marks are used around the string, spaces are allowed in the string.

ExtraInfo: VSM HA backup groups can be bound to a VSM HA instance group. A service instance (for exmaple, NAT) must be bound to a VSM HA instance group before NAT services are properly transmitted.
